alert.note: Alert for Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:40AM MST until January 20 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions including snow covered roads and reduced visibility can be expected at times across area roadways, including Highways 24 and 95. For those planning outdoor recreation, prepare for cold and snowy conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
